ygData.subject: One last post
ygData.msgSnippet: OK, one last post. ... She looked back and saw another bot chasing her.  She put on the extra speed and ran at full speed.  She turned for a second, fired her

OK, one last post.

::SnowCat::

She looked back and saw another bot chasing her.  She put on the 
extra speed and ran at full speed.  She turned for a second, fired 
her optic lazars at the bot and then ran for it.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::DeathScythe::
> 
> Scanners reporting that the bot he had been following was on the 
run, 
> DeathScythe transforms into his hideous beast mode, taking off 
after the bot. 
> His beastmode smashes through and past trees as he runs, following 
SnowCat.
